attributes.action: reduce the number of illegal immigrants in this county
attributes.additional_details: Because it is not fair on working class people to be paying tax for the government to house illegal migrants
attributes.background: Get migrants deported as we are paying tax to fund their life

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Deport all illegal migrants in the United Kingdom
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729231
